name: Whaling On Me
description:
'Whaling On Me' is a short naval game about helping out a whale.

A whale is being hunted by whale hunters. But you get out on the sea and shoot those hunters with your cannons.

Made for #GBJAM in 2019

Made by @coffeemuggames

How To Play:

   Up - Go Faster

   Left / Right - Steer

   Spacebar (in game) - Fire Cannons 

   Return / Spacebar (in menus) - Resume
